attributes.action: commit the government to hold a referendum on popular petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should introduce legislation stating that any petition on this site that attracts at least 20,000 signatures should automatically be turned into a popular referendum within 6 months with citizens having a fair vote without government propaganda or public funds being used against the referendum

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
